notes.text: You pretty much autolose too SSA except you destroy there field spell befor they can SSA or you negate Whale or you econ take if they don't have whale and kill them but luckily I face like only 2 SSA won 1 lost 1 vs Sylvs was EZ cuz I can negate or they kill my Phoenix and he comes back my turn and I beat down OTK the monkey searches good cards  basically I dont recommend playing this since I think I only got KOG with this since its so late in too the season and all the pros are already KOG
